title: Targeted Therapy in HER2+ Breast Cancer
summary: Phase 3 randomized study evaluating targeted therapy plus standard of care in adults with HER2-positive breast cancer.
locations: New York, New York, United States
eligibility_text:
Inclusion Criteria:
Participants must be 18 years or older.
Histologically confirmed HER2-positive breast cancer.
ECOG performance status 0 to 1.
Adequate organ function documented within 14 days.
LVEF >= 50% by echocardiogram.
No prior progression on study backbone drugs.
Able to comply with study visits.

Exclusion Criteria:
Pregnant or breastfeeding.
Known active CNS metastases requiring steroids.
Uncontrolled hypertension.
Recent myocardial infarction within 6 months.
Current severe infection.
History of hypersensitivity to investigational product.
Concurrent enrollment in conflicting interventional trial.
Use of prohibited medications within washout period.
QTc > 480 ms.
Any condition that, in investigator judgment, increases risk.

Additional Notes:
Participants will complete patient-reported outcomes every cycle.
Archived tissue samples should be submitted when available.
Participants should use effective contraception during treatment and 6 months after final dose.

criteria.evidence_text: Participants must be 18 years or older.
